title: How to Delete a Jobcase Account

steps.title: Open a web browser on your computer, phone, or tablet.
steps.content: Open a web browser on your computer, phone, or tablet. You can use any web browser, such as Chrome, Safari, Firefox, or Edge.

steps.title: Navigate https://www.jobcase.com/.
steps.content: Navigate https://www.jobcase.com/ . A contact form will appear.

steps.title: Enter the name and email address attached to your Jobcase account.
steps.content: Enter the name and email address attached to your Jobcase account.

steps.title: Select I want to unsubscribe from Jobcase from the drop-down menu.
steps.content: Select I want to unsubscribe from Jobcase from the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Type your request into the ″Message″ box.
steps.content: Type your request into the ″Message″ box. You’ll want to be specific and request that Jobcase deletes your account from their system. Examples: ″Please delete my Jobcase account as I no longer use the service.″ ″I would like to request that my Jobcase account be deleted.″

steps.title: Click or tap Send Message.
steps.content: Click or tap Send Message . It’s the blue button at the bottom of the form. A customer service representative at Jobcase will delete your account from the system.
